comment._content: A custody battle in 1915 in Wolfboro, New Hampshire: "Young Carpenter Closely Guarded. Ralph G. Carpenter of wolfboro and his 8-yearold son, ralph Jr. whom he took from his mother's side in front of the Oceanside hotel at ..."  Source: Boston Daily Globe on September 9, 1915.

comment._content: il ritocco lascia molto a desiderare ma il ritratto è molto bello
